name: Barn
description: You are in a large empty barn dominated by what seem to be abandoned stables. Cobwebs cover most surfaces. On the west wall, opposite the door, ancient tools are rusted to their racks, with a single holder missing something like a rake or staff.

east.name: Exit 1
east.description: A large barn door leads east

description.full: On a spear rack there is
description.empty: An empty spear rack is on one wall

responses.spear: When you place the spear on the rack, a poof of smoke reveals.

description.full: On a rack for pitchforks is
description.empty: An empty pitchfork rack rests on one wall

responses.pitchfork: When you place the pitchfork in its rack, a poof of smoke reveals.
